title: Boy trapped in Tanore pipe found dead after 32 hours
body: Fire service personnel found two-year old boy Sajid unconscious in a deep tube-well pipe on Thursday night and took him to a local hospital where he was declared dead, 32 hours after his falling into the abandoned pipe at Tanore upazila in Rajshahi on Wednesday. Tanore upazila health and family planning officer Barnabus Hasdak later told New Age that the child was brought dead at the hospital at 9:30pm. Tanore police station officer-in-charge Md Shahinuzzaman said the boy was rescued at around 9:00pm and was being taken to Rajshahi Medical Hospital. Sajid slipped into the narrow pipe at about 1:20pm on Wednesday while following his mother at village Koelhat under Panchandar union, family members and local residents said. Later, fire service and civil defence personnel rescued him after digging about 50 feet around the pipe.
